mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECEIPT (RECEIPT_SHOP_ID ,RECEIPT_DATE, RECEIPT_AMOUNT, RECEIPT_BUSINESS_NUMBER, RECEIPT_APPROVAL_NUMBER, RECEIPT_SHOP_NAME) VALUES (#{receiptShopId}, #{receiptDate}, #{receiptAmount}, #{receiptBusinessNumber}, #{receiptApprovalNumber}, #{receiptShopName})
mapper.select: SELECT receipt_id AS receiptId, receipt_date As receiptDate, receipt_amount AS receiptAmount, receipt_business_number AS receiptBusinessNumber, receipt_approval_number AS receiptApprovalNumber, receipt_shop_name AS receiptShopName FROM receipt WHERE receipt_id = #{receiptId}
SELECT shop_id FROM shop WHERE shop_name = #{shopName} LIMIT 1
